body: Interesting, the error's the same as #10455

So, from what I can see on the surface, `Object.hasOwn` [was introduced](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/release/v16.9.0#objecthasown) in Node [v16.9.0](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/release/v16.9.0) and is used in RHF codebase.

What's weird is that the last "working" version was [v7.44.0-rc.1](https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/releases/tag/v7.44.0-rc.1) _(npm can't find [v7.44.0-rc.2](https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/releases/tag/v7.44.0-rc.2)) for some reason; can't verify)_. I don't belive it contains any changes related to `Object.hasOwn` ü§î
@firasrg you can downgrade to something like [v7.43.9](https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/releases/tag/v7.43.9) for now

issue.title: issue: Object.hasOwn is not a function
